summary_md: San Marino, in the year 2024, has a per capita GDP of 51,277 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD), with an inflation rate of 1.24% (FP.CPI.TOTL.ZG), and an average life expectancy of 85.71 years years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN). The country's internet user penetration stands at 87.00% (IT.NET.USER.ZS), and its export growth is recorded at 197.41% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).

sections.economy_md: San Marino's economy is characterized by a per capita GDP of 51,277 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD) and an export growth of 197.41% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).

sections.health_env_md: The average life expectancy of 85.71 years years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN) reflects the health environment in San Marino.
